description: Application for a Minor Material Amendment (S.73) to vary condition 3 to change hours of operation to 24hrs opening in pursuant to planning permission 215256VAR dated 17/11/2021 for 'Change of use of ground floor from Betting Shop (Sui Generis) to Adult Gaming Centre (Sui Generis)'
decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from 21/05/2020 which is the date of planning permission 200666FUL
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
| The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans:
KS/ST/01/COU A - Existing and proposed floor plan and location plan
Archo Consulting Noise Report (reference: PR2001_52_FINAL R7),
Letter from Potential Planning dated 05 July 2022,
Independent observation report by Leveche Associates Limited
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| The hours of operation shall be open 24 hours a day, seven days a week.

Reason: In the interests of safeguarding the residential amenity of nearby residents in accordance with policies 7A of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013 and Supplementary Planning Guidance 10 Noise and Vibration, and London Plan 2021, National Planning Policy Framework 2021.

| The sound insulation of the Adult Gaming Centre and of any mitigation measures shall ensure that noise from the use and activities is contained within the application site, as assessed according to standards of the Council's SPG10 and criteria of BS8233:2014, at the nearest and most affected noise sensitive premises incl. offices and private external amenity spaces. Measures shall be implemented prior to use of the development and thereafter be permanently retained.

Reason: In the interests of safeguarding the residential amenity of nearby residents in accordance with policies 7A of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan 2013 and Supplementary Planning Guidance 10 Noise and Vibration, and London Plan 2021 and National Planning Policy Framework 2021.
